sources.title: Eleven v3 Audio Tags: Multi-Character Dialogue in AI ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some text-to-speech services and tools that can generate conversations with multiple distinct voices (good for dialogs, podcasts, or scripts with character lines): AI platforms with multi-voice or multi-speaker support ElevenLabs – very natural voices and now supports multi-character dialogue with voice tags (script different characters). ElevenLabs+1
Play.ht (multi-voice TTS) – supports creating conversations in one audio file with different voices. Play.ht
Kukarella – built for multi-speaker dialogues and voiceovers. Kukarella

sources.title: Speech generation (text-to-speech) | Gemini API
sources.snippet: The Gemini API can transform text input into single speaker or multi-speaker audio using native text-to-speech (TTS) generation capabilities.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Google Gemini / Google Cloud TTS – API can generate multi-speaker audio from structured text. Google Cloud Documentation+1
Typecast.ai – large voice library, good for character dialogs in content. Typecast

sources.title: I Tested 25+ AI Voice Generators: Here are the Top 7 for ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Fish Audio / Voxify / ReadSpeaker – large voice collections that let you assign different voices to lines. Fish Audio+2Voxify+2
